description: Erection of side and rear dormer roof extensions with installation of 2no. front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion. Erection of first floor rear infill extension to enclose existing inset balcony.
decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with  Class B.1 (d) (the cubic content of the resulting roof space would exceed the cubic content of the original roof space by more that - (i)  40 cubic metres in the case of a terrace house, or (ii) 50 cubic metres in any other case) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Condition B.2 (b) (i) (bb)  (edge of enlargement closest to eaves of the original roof shall, so far as practicable, not be less than 0.2 metres from the eaves, measured along the roof slope from the outside edge of the eaves) of Class B, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The first floor rear extension would not comply with limitation (i) of Class A Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 (as amended) which states that development is not permitted if the enlarged part of the dwellinghouse be within 2 metres of the boundary of the curtilage of the dwellinghouse, and the height of the eaves of the enlarged part would exceed 3 metres.
